text: As of Early March 2021, more Canadians (59%; +9 since December 2020) intend to get #vaccinated against #COVID19 as soon as permitted. Fewer say they will wait awhile (21%; -8) or never get the shot (8%; -3). See our full report: https://t.co/ufUC5CAQYD #CdnPoli #vaccine #vaccines https://t.co/O2N4MKxfy4
